income_messages:
From: i*********k@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2022-07-27 21:34:00
SUBJECT:   Dear Friend,
  Dear Friend,
My Name is Mr. Daniel Obi. I am an Accountant-General in Oil and Gas
sector in my region, l was mandated to investigate and made payment to
all outstanding transaction within the organization which I did.
As a Regional and payment Director , l have before me an  over invoice
payment $175.5Million US dollars from crude Oil Sales contracts
unclaimed . The money  is in escrow account with a bank.
Based on facts, l seek your consent to transfer the money through you
for an investment on our mutual joint interest which solely you will
manage and control investment since l am still active in
service. Alternatively, I can invest in your line of business if you are
interested and if your line of business is viable. Please indicate
interest to enable me update you appropriately.
Please all your reply to be sent to my private email
box(
denielobi2004@gmail.com
)
Note precisely your confidentiality is highly required for our urgent
success. Thanks and Remain bless
Sincerely.
Mr. Daniel Obi
Regional Accountant General/Pay Officer.   
From: i*********k@gmail.com
To: pj26019@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-27 23:02:36
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Friend,
Dear Friend,
I thank you very much for your acceptance towards handling this big
transaction and investment of the funds after being claimed out from
the bank and promise you that you will not regrate this your assistant
towards this.
First I will need you to send to me your full names and address so I
can use it to put in the list of one of our contractors that were paid
and some that have not received theirs as back up.I will also need
your direct mobile no so we can first talk on phone before I can tell
all you should know.
All this is important because I have to know the person I am trusting
such amount in your care.
I will also need a scan copy of your international passport.
I will also want to know the area of business were you think that will
be good to invest the money on.in your country and you will help me
manage it pending when I will meet with you in your country. You will
also get 20% out of the money for your good assistant to me.
Note that you will never regrate assisting me towards this venture.
All reply to be sent to my private email( denielobi2004@gmail.com)
I now await for your kind response in the hope that we can enter into
a good business venture without any problems.
Regards
Daniel Obi
From: i*********k@gmail.com
To: pj26019@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-28 10:59:33

Ur mail was well noted by me.please go ahead and send to me the

SUBJECT: Re:   Dear Friend,
Mister Obi,You're missing the point. Best,
Russell
